title: When is all for one coming out?

embed.description: The Rotating Game Mode queue allows League of Legends players to to play the current featured game mode. It is made available starting on Friday local time, and ends early Tuesday morning.* was active in continue for the whole period

body:
According to this wiki (http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Rotating_Game_Mode) all for one is coming out next. 

Is it ?

and if so do we know when based on the PBE?

Sorry if its a stupid q

replies.body: Based on the recent [announcement](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/kkT9tXKE-quick-update-on-rotating-game-modes) regarding the RGMQ and the One For All mode, we may be getting it as soon as a month from now, maybe a bit longer. Logically, the mode would go into the RGMQ when it comes back up, since that's what they're specifically working on currently.
